Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes

Class TaskRouter

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes.SoileRouter
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes.ElementRouter<Task>
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.http_server.routes.TaskRouter
public class TaskRouter extends ElementRouter<Task>
The Task Router (of the element Router needs a couple of additional routes like Resource Posting/retrieval).
Author:
Thomas Pfau

  • Constructor Details

    • TaskRouter

      public TaskRouter(io.vertx.ext.mongo.MongoClient client, IDSpecificFileProvider resManager, io.vertx.core.Vertx vertx, SoileAuthorization auth)
      Default constructor All Functions receiving a routing context use that routing context to provide the Response.
      Parameters:
      client - the MongoClient for DB access
      resManager - the IDSpecificFileProvider used for file retrieval.
      vertx - The Vertx instance for communication
      auth - The SoileAuthorization for authorization checks.
